Package BLL

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    Client Record
    ClientRegister
    Lazy loading singleton
    ContentEvent
    ContentManager tree update event argument object passed with details of the event used to notify ContentTree of tree ADDs, DELETEs, UPDATE's & MOVEs
    ContentManager
    This class managers is used for additions and removals of MediaItems from the tree structure It provides all events to the TaskList and ContentTree objects from activity from MediaItems
    Contractor
    Contractor is a type of worker used
    Encrypter
    Encryption algorithm used for user password
    File
    Store the file location and maintains a version where changed
    Freelancer
    Freelancer is a type of worker used
    MediaAsset
    Leaf node in the BLL tree structure of project content
    MediaAssetSubtitlesWorkFlow
    Defines the work flow for a media asset though the system by providing:- a list of permitted actions based upon the submitted status a list of worker types and roles to allocate each task to based upon the status
    MediaAssetWorkFlow
    Defines the work flow for a media asset though the system by providing:- a list of permitted actions based upon the submitted status a list of worker types and roles to allocate each task to based upon the status
    MediaElement
    Parent node in the BLL tree structure of project content
    MediaElementWorkFlow
    Defines the work flow for a media element though the system by providing:- a list of permitted actions based upon the submitted status a list of worker types and roles to allocate each task to based upon the status
    MediaItem
    Media Tree interface - part of composite pattern
    MediaItemWorkFlow
    Work flow interface for Assets and Element control of operations
    MediaIterator
    Iterator used by parent nodes in the BLL tree to conform with the interface when iterating over the tree
    NullIterator
    Null Iterator used by leaf nodes in the BLL tree to conform with the interface when iterating over the tree
    Project
    Defines a project
    ProjectRegister
    A singleton register for all projects
    QCReport
    QC Report
    Staff
    Defines Staff
    TaskItem
    An individual task on a MediaItem
    TaskList
    TaskList register for the project
    TaskListEvent
    MediaItem TaskList update event argument object passed with details of the event
    Worker
    Base class for all workers e.g.
    WorkerFactory
    Creates all worker objects
    WorkerRegister
    Register for all worker type classes e.g.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ComponentType
    Enumeration of the different types of components used and created by the project content tree
    FileStatus
    Status of files within the vault
    MediaSource
    Origin of media
    MediaStatus
    Media asset and element status
    NodeType
    Enumeration used within the code for the node types supported Also provides text to display for each type in UI
    Region
    Defines the DVD & Blu-ray disc regions
    TaskStatus
    Status of individual tasks
    WorkerRoles
    Defined roles for all workers
    WorkerType
    Defined types for all workers
